page.description: This concerns Image properties for images based on field controls. For more information about using image files as Links, see using images in Link Fields.

item.name: Image definition
item.description: You can specify a static image, or a dynamic image that changes, based on data in the current record.

item.name: Image title
item.description: Specify the bubble help for the image. You can include field values in the help text by enclosing them in curly braces. For example: {customer_id}

item.name: Image class name
item.description: Specify the class name for the image

item.name: Image style
item.description: Specify the style for the image.
